title: Technical Skills
metaDescription: Pasquale Carmine Carbone's technical skills: programming languages, frameworks, cloud computing, databases and development methodologies.

header.title: Skills & Technologies
header.description: A comprehensive technology toolkit, built through years of practical experience and continuous learning to tackle the challenges of the modern digital world.

fullStack.title: Full-Stack Development
fullStack.description: Complete development of modern applications, from user interface to backend microservices
highlights: Modern frontends with SvelteKit and React
Scalable backends with FastAPI and Spring Boot

cloudNative.title: Cloud-Native Architecture
cloudNative.description: Design and implementation of scalable and resilient cloud solutions
highlights: AWS Lambda, ECS and serverless services
CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code

dataEngineering.title: Data Engineering
dataEngineering.description: Large-scale data management and analysis with modern technologies
highlights: ETL pipelines with Apache Spark and Databricks
Data lakes and vector search with MongoDB

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Development of automated solutions to optimize processes and workflows

devops.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
devops.description: Complete infrastructure management and automated deployment
highlights: CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Infrastructure as Code with CDK and Terraform
Monitoring and logging with cloud-native tools

philosophy.title: My Technology Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Technology is just a tool. The real value lies in solving real problems for real people, creating solutions that improve life and work.

results.title: Focus on Results
results.description: I always choose the right technology for the problem, not the trendiest one
